thread.section_title: Rome Style Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our visit on February 27th 2017
thread.title_full: Our visit on February 27th 2017 - Review of Rome Style Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Shane W
title: Our visit on February 27th 2017
text: We visited this hotel on the 27th February and stayed 4 nights, perfect location and excellent staff members who greeted us warmly, our room was perfect for our holiday and us as a couple, special thank you to Peter/Pedro for helping with our experience of Rome . Definitely go back to this hotel !!
